Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Los Angeles (N) in 1966...
Injured on 5/9/1968 with a Bruised Neck, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1969, off Juan Marichal (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/1/1969, off Juan Marichal (SF)...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/6/1969, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against New York (N) on 10/13/1971...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
Hit for the cycle against Atlanta on 6/28/1972...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Atlanta on 6/28/1972...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/1/1972, hitting .560 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Baltimore, driving in 3 runs on 8/2/1976...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1977, hitting .391 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1977, hitting .522 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1977, hitting .600 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1978, hitting .462 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 5/31/1978 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1980, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1980, hitting .352 with 6 HR, 21 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/7/1982 to a 2-year deal worth $12,000,000 per year...
